author: Timothy Gardner
title: Trump administration working to ease drilling industry cash crunch
description: The Trump administration is seeking to ease a severe cash crunch in the drilling industry by raising loan limits available under a coronavirus stimulus package and by barring lenders from discriminating against drillers, according to Energy Secretary Dan Brou…
